languages.text: {n}Собравшиеся обращают к вам напряженные лица — лица людей деловых, цепких и жестоких. Хладные торговцы хранят почтительную тишину, нарушаемую лишь шипением тлеющей самокрутки с лхо, которую со вкусом раскуривает темноволосый мужчина аристократической внешности в дорогом камзоле. Среди преступников он выделяется, словно князь среди свиты.{/n}

{n}Tense faces turn toward you, the faces of people who are hard-nosed, hard-fisted, and hard-hearted. The Cold Traders maintain a deferential silence, which is broken only by the hiss of the smouldering lho roll-up being smoked with relish by a dark-haired, aristocratic-looking man in a sumptuous coat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Собравшиеся обращают к вам напряженные лица — лица людей деловых, цепких и жестоких. Хладные торговцы хранят почтительную тишину, нарушаемую лишь шипением тлеющей самокрутки с лхо, которую со вкусом раскуривает темноволосый мужчина аристократической внешности в дорогом камзоле. Среди преступников он выделяется, словно князь среди свиты.{/n}

The Cold Traders maintain a deferential silence, which is broken only by the hiss of the smouldering lho roll-up being smoked with relish by a dark-haired, aristocratic-looking man in a sumptuous coat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}无数张紧绷的脸转向你，这些人看起来态度强硬，心黑手辣。这些冷市商人商人保持着恭敬地沉默，其中一个贵族模样的黑发男人穿着华服，津津有味地吸着麻烟。只有麻烟发出的嘶嘶声，打破了会场的沉默。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tense faces turn toward you, the faces of people who are hard-nosed, hard-fisted, and hard-hearted. The Cold Traders maintain a deferential silence, which is broken only by the hiss of the smouldering lho roll-up being smoked with relish by a dark-haired, aristocratic-looking man in a sumptuous coat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}无数张紧绷的脸转向你，这些人看起来态度强硬，心黑手辣。这些冷市商人商人保持着恭敬地沉默，其中一个贵族模样的黑发男人穿着华服，津津有味地吸着麻烟。只有麻烟发出的嘶嘶声，打破了会场的沉默。{/n}

languages.text: {n}緊張した面持ちがあなたに向けられる。居並ぶ人々の顔は、強情で、したたかで、たくましそうな顔つきだった。コールド・トレーダーたちは敬虔な沈黙を守っていた。その沈黙を破るのは、豪華なコートを着た黒髪の貴族風の男が美味しそうに燻す、アイホの煙の音だけだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tense faces turn toward you, the faces of people who are hard-nosed, hard-fisted, and hard-hearted. The Cold Traders maintain a deferential silence, which is broken only by the hiss of the smouldering lho roll-up being smoked with relish by a dark-haired, aristocratic-looking man in a sumptuous coat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}緊張した面持ちがあなたに向けられる。居並ぶ人々の顔は、強情で、したたかで、たくましそうな顔つきだった。コールド・トレーダーたちは敬虔な沈黙を守っていた。その沈黙を破るのは、豪華なコートを着た黒髪の貴族風の男が美味しそうに燻す、アイホの煙の音だけだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una serie de caras tensas se gira hacia ti. Pertenecen a gente dura, avariciosa y despiadada. Los representantes del Comercio Frío guardan un respetuoso silencio que solo rompe el siseo de un pitillo liado de lho. El que lo fuma es un hombre de aspecto aristocrático y pelo oscuro, ataviado con un ostentoso abrigo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tense faces turn toward you, the faces of people who are hard-nosed, hard-fisted, and hard-hearted. The Cold Traders maintain a deferential silence, which is broken only by the hiss of the smouldering lho roll-up being smoked with relish by a dark-haired, aristocratic-looking man in a sumptuous coat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una serie de caras tensas se gira hacia ti. Pertenecen a gente dura, avariciosa y despiadada. Los representantes del Comercio Frío guardan un respetuoso silencio que solo rompe el siseo de un pitillo liado de lho. El que lo fuma es un hombre de aspecto aristocrático y pelo oscuro, ataviado con un ostentoso abrigo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des visages tendus se tournent vers vous, appartenant à des gens impitoyables, durs et au cœur de pierre. Les marchands du Commerce Froid observent un silence respectueux, seulement rompu par les sifflements du lho roulé que fume avec délice un homme aux cheveux noirs et à l'air d'aristocrate portant un somptueux manteau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tense faces turn toward you, the faces of people who are hard-nosed, hard-fisted, and hard-hearted. The Cold Traders maintain a deferential silence, which is broken only by the hiss of the smouldering lho roll-up being smoked with relish by a dark-haired, aristocratic-looking man in a sumptuous coat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des visages tendus se tournent vers vous, appartenant à des gens impitoyables, durs et au cœur de pierre. Les marchands du Commerce Froid observent un silence respectueux, seulement rompu par les sifflements du lho roulé que fume avec délice un homme aux cheveux noirs et à l'air d'aristocrate portant un somptueux manteau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dir wenden sich angespannte Gesichter zu, Gesichter von hartgesottenen, unbarmherzigen und hartherzigen Leuten. Die Kalthändler wahren respektvolles Schweigen, das nur durch das Zischen der glimmenden Lho-Zigarette gebrochen wird, die ein dunkelhaariger, adlig wirkender Mann in luxuriösem Mantel genüsslich raucht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tense faces turn toward you, the faces of people who are hard-nosed, hard-fisted, and hard-hearted. The Cold Traders maintain a deferential silence, which is broken only by the hiss of the smouldering lho roll-up being smoked with relish by a dark-haired, aristocratic-looking man in a sumptuous coat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dir wenden sich angespannte Gesichter zu, Gesichter von hartgesottenen, unbarmherzigen und hartherzigen Leuten. Die Kalthändler wahren respektvolles Schweigen, das nur durch das Zischen der glimmenden Lho-Zigarette gebrochen wird, die ein dunkelhaariger, adlig wirkender Mann in luxuriösem Mantel genüsslich raucht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gergin yüzler sana dönüyor. Çıkarcı, bileği kuvvetli ve taş kalpli insanların yüzleri. Soğuk Tacirler, saygılı sessizliklerini koruyor. Bu sessizliği bozan ise şatafatlı bir palto giymiş, aristokrat görünümlü, siyah saçlı adamın iştahla içtiği sarma lihonun ateşinin tıslaması oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tense faces turn toward you, the faces of people who are hard-nosed, hard-fisted, and hard-hearted. The Cold Traders maintain a deferential silence, which is broken only by the hiss of the smouldering lho roll-up being smoked with relish by a dark-haired, aristocratic-looking man in a sumptuous coat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gergin yüzler sana doğru dönüyor. Çıkarcı, bileği kuvvetli ve taş kalpli insanların yüzleri. Soğuk Tacirler saygılı sessizliklerini koruyorlar ve bu sessizliği yalnızca, şatafatlı bir palto giymiş, aristokrat görünümlü, siyah saçlı adamın iştahla içtiği sarma lihonun ateşinin tıslaması bozuyor.{/n}
